text:
If the test being run outputs an invalid XML character (e.g. \u0000), this gets formatted into the XML reports verbatim, which is illegal XML.

Any character which is not legal in XML should be replaced somehow.

Note that Ant is currently replacing \u0000 with � -- but unfortunately this is not OK in XML either (and I wish they would permit it as it has caused issues in our own app in the past too!)
